query.mssql: WITH LastAssignment AS ( -- Определяем последнее задание для каждой задачи SELECT ag.Task AS TaskId, MAX(ag.Completed) AS LastCompleted FROM Sungero_WF_Assignment ag LEFT JOIN Sungero_WF_Task t ON ag.Task = t.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_WF_Attachment a ON a.Task = t.Id INNER JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc e ON a.AttachmentId = e.Id WHERE a.[Group] = '08E1EF90-521F-41A1-A13F-C6F175007E54' AND e.BusinessUnit_Docflow_Sungero = @businessUnit AND ag.Subject NOT LIKE '%Внести договор в учетную систему 1С БП%' AND ag.Subject NOT LIKE '%Поставить договор на валютный банковский контроль%' AND ag.Subject NOT LIKE '%Предоставление почтовой информации%' AND ag.Subject NOT LIKE '%Распечатка и организация подписания%' AND ag.Subject NOT LIKE '%Подготовка товаров на складе%' AND ag.Subject NOT LIKE '%На исполнение%' and ag.Discriminator != 'EF79164B-2CE7-451B-9BA6-EB59DD9A4A74' and ag.Discriminator != 'BE83F002-C2C0-49DA-AFF5-B7F3BDDAABF7' and ag.Discriminator != '32CE5B61-1BE2-4D61-B98A-37B99AFF3560' and ag.Discriminator != '7D9F857C-9A46-4A16-89BF-0AA9C2E629D9' and ag.Discriminator != 'DFE429F9-8BBE-4920-B911-FE278031315A' and ag.Discriminator != '7D9816F6-1DEA-4718-84A5-1A413DF81145' and ag.Discriminator != '3DAD0441-CD89-4928-B6FF-9B7DD7FC20CF' and ag.Discriminator != '8724ADA0-FA56-481D-B3D0-AE3E46FF3E31' and ag.Discriminator != '75D6C458-7725-4133-8FF4-848E16EC5BD3' and ag.Discriminator != '4CA82B63-1B51-4AEF-A42B-57B7C97DAB64' and ag.Discriminator != 'AB194340-550C-41C7-BADD-ADC2EE208741' and ag.Created >= @startDate and ag.Created <= @endDate AND t.Status = 'Completed' GROUP BY ag.Task ) -- Вычисляем среднее время согласования в рабочих днях по типу документа SELECT e.Discriminator AS DocumentDiscriminator, ROUND( AVG( DATEDIFF(DAY, t.Started, la.LastCompleted) -- Вычитаем количество выходных (суббот и воскресений) - (DATEDIFF(WEEK, t.Started, la.LastCompleted) * 2) -- Учитываем неполные недели (если начало в выходной или завершение в выходной) - CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, t.Started) = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, la.LastCompleted) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ), 2) AS AvgApprovalTimeInWorkingDays FROM LastAssignment la INNER JOIN Sungero_WF_Task t ON la.TaskId = t.Id INNER JOIN Sungero_WF_Attachment a ON a.Task = t.Id INNER JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc e ON a.AttachmentId = e.Id WHERE a.[Group] = '08E1EF90-521F-41A1-A13F-C6F175007E54' AND e.BusinessUnit_Docflow_Sungero = @businessUnit GROUP BY e.Discriminator;
